title: Five-Star Art Deco France Elegance on the Basque Coast with Atrium Bar & Terrace Restaurant
description: Grandeur, intricate design and the fresh breeze of the Basque Coast all await at the Regina Experimental Biarritz. Sitting atop a cliff face looking directly at the emblematic Biarritz lighthouse, this luxury hotel offers a glimpse into the glamour of early 20th century France, while seamlessly blending modern comforts. Indulge in a meal as the sun sets over the sea at Frenchie Biarritz, or perhaps discover the Art Deco jewels of the seaside town just a short stroll away.

title: France: Biarritz Boutique Beachside Art Deco Escape with Resort-Style Pool & Basque Restaurant
description: Unearth the hidden gems of the Basque Country with a stay at Hotel Le Garage Biarritz - a dreamy beachside haven, designed for lovers of Art Deco splendour.  Spend your days in this coastal playground of the rich and famous exploring the legendary Grande Plage beach, the iconic Biarritz Lighthouse and the historic Sainte Eugenie Church before returning to the hotel's sun-soaked terrace, where you can enjoy Basque-inspired plates at the onsite Neo Bistro.

title: Five-Star Beachfront Biarritz Escape with Panoramic Pool, Serene Spa & Restaurant
description:
Perched along the surf-friendly shores of Biarritz’s legendary Miramar Beach, this Sofitel retreat offers an elegant fusion of French art de vivre and coastal serenity. Facing the Atlantic, with its graceful silhouette reminiscent of a cruise ship, the hotel boasts sophisticated rooms with terraces, SofitelMyBeds™ and luxurious ensuites

Spend your days unwinding in heated saltwater indoor or outdoor pools, or indulge in rejuvenating thalassotherapy treatments that harness the healing properties of the sea. Discover seasonal Basque cuisine with a modern twist at the panoramic restaurant and sip on well-crafted cocktails from the bar. When it's time to explore, the iconic Rocher de la Vierge rock formation and the Biarritz Lighthouse are within easy reach.
location_description: Sofitel Biarritz le Miramar Thalassa sea & spa
